author: sussman
msg: More work on dumpfile parser.  Saving work incrementally, to avoid the
power-plant effect.
* dump.c (close_directory): duh, don't forget to clear the subpool.
* svn_repos.h (svn_repos_parse_dumpstream): take a global parse_baton.
(svn_repos_parse_fns_t):  have new_revision_record take a
parse_baton, and have new_node_record take a revision_baton.
* load.c (struct parse_baton):  new baton type.
(struct revision_baton): point to a parse_baton.
(make_revision_baton): take parse_baton.
(new_revision_record): take parse_baton.
(new_node_record):  take revision_baton.
(make_node_baton):  take revision_baton.
(get_parser): new constructor func.
(svn_repos_load_fs): call get_parser.
(parser_callbacks):  delete static vtable.

author: sussman
msg: Continue skeletal work on dumpfile-stream parser.
* libsvn_repos.dsp:  out of kindness to win32 folks, add 'load.c'
* dump.c : rename all node_action_* into svn_node_action_*.
(enum node_action):  remove from here...
* svn_repos.h
(enum svn_node_action):  re-add here, so parser vtables can use it too.
(svn_repos_parse_dumpstream):  take a const vtable.
(svn_repos_parse_fns_t): make two separate propset funcs, and two
separate close funcs, just like in our editor.  The vtable
implementor shouldn't have to figure out what kind of baton is
coming in.
* load.c
(svn_repos_load_fs): man, this routine just puts 1 and 1 together!
(svn_repos_parse_dumpstream):  new skeleton.
(parser_callbacks):  define the skeleton of a vtable for the parser.

author: kfogel
msg: No more electric shocks every time we branch the trunk.
With Mike Pilato, start work on issue #582 (making svnlook's commit
email diffs show copies as copies, instead of as twenty terabyte
adds).  End goal is to make svn_repos_dir_delta send copyfrom_args to
the editor, and thereunder express only differences against the copy
source.  Note that this does not address issue #503 (making
server->client traffic use copyfrom args so we can send smaller deltas
over the wire).
This change just removes the old support for copyfrom_args, since it
was disabled and wasn't going to fully address issue #503 anyway.
With Mike Pilato:
* subversion/include/svn_repos.h
(svn_repos_dir_delta): New use_copy_history param replaces
use_copyfrom_args; change interface promise regarding copyfrom
history.  Consistify tense in rest of doc string.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/delta.c
(struct context): It's use_copy_history now, not use_copyfrom_args.
(svn_repos_dir_delta): Same, and remove preprocessor conditional.
Also, fix typo.
(add_file_or_dir): Remove source_parent and source_entry parameters.
(find_nearest_entry): Removed.

author: sussman
msg: Begin work on a general parser for a dumpfile-formatted stream.
* fs_dumprestore.txt:  tweak dumpfile spec a hair.
* load.c:  new file, nothing in there yet.
* dump.c
(make_dir_baton): fix brain-o spotted by gstein.  :-)
(SVN_REPOS_DUMPFILE_*): move all RFC822 header defines from here...
* svn_repos.h
(SVN_REPOS_DUMPFILE_*): ...to here, now public, so people can write
different vtable back-ends for our dumpfile parser.
(svn_repos_load_fs):  declare.
(svn_repos_parser_fns_t): new vtable, driven by the dumpfile parser.
(svn_repos_parse_dumpstream):  declare the parser.

author: kfogel
msg: New branch, for issue 654 work ("switch our NodeRevID representation").
